name: Credit Crunch
title: Limited Domestic Credit Access
description: In 2023, Tajikistan's domestic credit provided by the financial sector was only 11.31% of GDP, indicating limited access to financial resources for businesses and individuals.

name: Transport Investment Boost
title: Growing Private Investment in Transport
description: In 2022, Tajikistan attracted $4.5 million in private investments for transport infrastructure, highlighting a growing interest in improving connectivity.

name: Spending Surge
title: Rapid Growth in Consumption Expenditure
description: Tajikistan experienced a 14.33% growth in final consumption expenditure in 2022, reflecting a robust increase in consumer spending.

name: Educated Employment
title: Low Unemployment Among Educated Workforce
description: In 2016, only 0.24% of Tajikistan's labor force with advanced education was unemployed, showcasing effective employment of skilled individuals.

name: Early Marriage Decline
title: Minimal Early Marriages Among Women
description: By 2017, only 0.1% of women aged 20-24 in Tajikistan were married by age 15, indicating progress in delaying early marriages.

name: Trade Security
title: Comprehensive Binding Coverage in Trade
description: In 2021, Tajikistan achieved 100% binding coverage for all products and primary products, ensuring stable and predictable trade tariffs.
